hero.description: Tell us where you want to go and when — our AI builds a complete, day-by-day itinerary with optimized routes, curated activities, and real booking links. Adjust everything on a visual timeline and map, then share with your travel crew in one click.

examples.title: Trips built with TravelFlow
examples.subtitle: Browse real itineraries created by our community — from week-long island getaways to cross-country road trips.

featureShowcase.title: Everything you need to plan, share, and go
featureShowcase.subtitle: From first spark of inspiration to boarding pass — TravelFlow handles the entire journey.

aiTripCreation.title: AI Trip Creation
aiTripCreation.description: Describe your dream trip in plain language. Our AI builds a complete, day-by-day itinerary with smart city sequencing, activity suggestions, and estimated travel times — all in under 30 seconds.

interactiveMapStyles.title: Interactive Map Styles
interactiveMapStyles.description: Switch between satellite, terrain, and minimalist map layers. See your route come alive with animated path lines, city markers, and dynamic zoom that follows your scroll position.

easyItineraryAdjustments.title: Easy Itinerary Adjustments
easyItineraryAdjustments.description: Drag cities to reorder, stretch durations, or add spontaneous stops — all on a visual timeline. Changes cascade automatically so dates and connections always stay in sync.

communityExamples.title: Community Examples
communityExamples.description: Browse itineraries from fellow travelers to discover hidden gems and proven routes. Fork any community trip as a starting point for your own adventure.

shareCollaborate.title: Share & Collaborate
shareCollaborate.description: Generate a shareable link in one click. Co-travelers see the full map, timeline, and activity list — no account required. Updates sync instantly for everyone viewing the trip.

activityBookingLinks.title: Activity Booking Links
activityBookingLinks.description: Each AI-suggested activity links directly to booking platforms. Reserve tours, restaurants, and transport without leaving your itinerary — keeping everything in one place.

cta.title: Ready to plan your next trip?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of travelers who build smarter itineraries in minutes. No account needed to start.
